text: Aquilaria hirta is a species of plant in the Thymelaeaceae family. It is found in Malaysia and Indonesia. Aquilaria hirta are suited for carving and hard like stone, but the species of Aquilaria hirta are seldom used in perfume and incense due to rarity. ==References== hirta Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aquilaria hirta
